Added.Description: Sets your sanity to 100 making it infinite.

Added.Description: Sets your stamina to 100 making it infinite.

Added.Description: Global speed hack toggle

Added.Name: Speed
Added.Description: The number the speed hack uses for your character speed

Added.Name: Gamma Hack
Added.Description: Global gamma toggle

Added.Name: Gamma
Added.Description: The number the gamma hack uses for the brightness

Added.Description: Global fov toggle

Added.Name: FOV
Added.Description: The number the fov hack uses for your character field of view

Added.Name: Ghost Info
Added.Description: Shows general infomation about the ghost

Added.Name: Level Info
Added.Description: Shows general infomation about the level

Added.Name: Player Info
Added.Description: Shows general infomation about the players

Added.Name: Player Info Separate Windows
Added.Description: Shows general infomation about the players with each player getting its own window

Added.Name: Crosshair
Added.Description: Draws a crosshair in the center middle of your screen

Added.Name: Crosshair Size
Added.Description: Controls the crosshair size

Added.Name: Crosshair Thickness
Added.Description: Controls the crosshair thickness

Added.Name: Teleportation
Added.Description: Lets you teleport to specific xyz coords

Added.Name: Save Current Position
Added.Description: Saves your characters current position to the xyz coords

Added.Name: Teleport
Added.Description: Teleports your character to the xyz coords

Added.Name: Reset Settings
Added.Description: Resets your config to the default

Added.Name: Save Settings
Added.Description: Saves all your settings to your config

Added.Name: Reload Settings
Added.Description: Reloads all your settings with your config

Added.Description: Opens the config.json file

Added.Name: Languages
Added.Description: Lets you change the menus language

Added.Name: Colors
Added.Description: Shows all the customizable colors

Added.Name: Crosshair Color
Added.Description: Lets you change the crosshair color
